greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Take the binary expansion of n, starting with the most significant bit, and concatenate the lengths of the runs.
comment: Obviously this compressed notation is useful only for n < 1023. A101211 is a version which works for all n.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 09 2018
